item.title: C# 9 records as strongly-typed ids - Part 5: final bits and conclusion
item.description: We’re reaching the end of this series on records as strongly-typed ids. Sorry for the long delay since the last postâ€¦ life happened! So far we’ve covered ASP.NET Core model binding, JSON serialization, and EF Core integration. Almost everything is working, we just need to fix a few more details. Handling database-generated values in EF Core First, I want to address a question asked by @OpsOwns in the comments of the last post:
